trans-unit.source: Enables service debugging for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] callback object.
trans-unit.target: Consente il debug del servizio per un [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] oggetto callback.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The constructor creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior> object in which the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property is the value of `includeExceptionDetailInFaults`.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore crea un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior>oggetto in cui il valore di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>proprietà è il valore di `includeExceptionDetailInFaults`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Controls whether a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] callback object includes managed exception information in the detail of the SOAP faults sent back to the service.
trans-unit.target: Controlli se una [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] oggetto callback include informazioni sulle eccezioni gestite nei dettagli degli errori SOAP inviati al servizio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that controls whether client callback objects return managed exception information in SOAP faults back to the service.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che controlla se oggetti callback del client restituiscono informazioni sulle eccezioni gestite negli errori SOAP al servizio.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] returns managed client callback exception information in the SOAP faults for service debugging purposes in duplex communication; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] restituisce informazioni sulle eccezioni di callback client negli errori SOAP per il servizio nella comunicazione duplex, il debug gestite in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metodo per supportare il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to modify.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint da modificare.

trans-unit.source: The objects that binding elements require to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti necessari agli elementi di associazione per supportare il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> per supportare il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Assegna il valore del <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>proprietà per il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.CallbackDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that is to be customized.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint che deve essere personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: The client runtime to be customized.
trans-unit.target: Il runtime del client da personalizzare.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> per supportare il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=fullName>; this behavior can only be used in a client application.
trans-unit.target: Genera un <xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=fullName>; questo comportamento può essere utilizzato solo in un'applicazione client.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint that exposes the contract.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint che espone il contratto.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint dispatcher to be modified or extended.
trans-unit.target: Dispatcher dell'endpoint da modificare o estendere.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> per supportare il comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to validate.
trans-unit.target: Endpoint da convalidare.
